name: Mario Paint: Yuushou Naizou Ban
overview: Mario Paint: Yuushou Naizou Ban ran between December 28, 1997 and January 31, 1998. It is a modified version of the original Mario Paint BS Ban that includes the winning design from the associated "Mario Paint Contest". The winning picture was designed by a Tokyo-based gamer named Hiroko Mizota and it is entitled "Dreaming of the Moon."
